Represents a bookshelf with 6 rows and 5 columns to store item tiles.

Represents a message sent to the client containing the bookshelf state.

Represents a response message sent to the client indicating the outcome of a request to change the number of players in the lobby.

Represents a request message sent to the server to change the number of players in the lobby.

A message representing a chat message from client, used for exchanging text-based communication between users.

This Class represents the whole Game.

Game controller that manages the flow of a game by calling the macro-methods of the model.

The abstract base class for messages sent to clients in the application.

This enum contains all message types.

The interface representing a message sent to client.

The interface representing a message sent to server.

Represents a message sent to the client indicating a change in the lobby administrator.

Represents a message indicating a new turn in the game.
NoCommonGoalMessage
Represents a message indicating that no common goal was achieved in the current round.
NotAdminMessage
Represents a message sent to the client indicating that the user is not the lobby administrator, therefore do not have access to the action they are trying to perform.

Observable class that can be observed by implementing the Observer interface and registering as listener.

Observer interface.

Represents a message containing personal goal points sent to a client.
Player
Represents a player in a game.
PlayerLeftMessage
Represents a message indicating that a player has left the game, sent to a client.
PlayerListRequest
Represents a request from the client to get the list of players in the lobby.
PlayerListResponse
Represents a response from the server containing the list of players in the lobby.
PlayerRejoinedMessage
Represents a message indicating that a player has rejoined the game, sent to a client.
PlayersInLobbyUpdate
Represents an update from the server containing the list of players in the lobby and additional content.
PlayerState
Represents different states a player can be in.
PreGameController
Represents a controller for the pre-game phase (connection and in lobby phase).
Printer
The Printer class provides functionality for printing messages and game display.
ReconnectionMessage
Represents a message sent to the client during reconnection to restore the game state.
Server
Represents a server interface for handling client registrations and updates.

Represents a server implementation for a game server.

This class represents a textual user interface for the game.

Represents a controller for the in-game-phase (manages turns).
TurnPhase
This enum contains all phases in a player's turn.

Represents a request message sent to the server for changing the username.

Represents a response message sent to the client indicating the outcome of a username changing request.
